name: Bytebot (OpenRouter)
description: Bytebot is an open-source AI desktop agent that provides a complete virtual desktop environment where AI can autonomously complete complex tasks across multiple applications.
author: bytebot-ai

form_fields.label: OpenRouter API Key
form_fields.hint: Required for AI model access. Sign up at https://openrouter.ai

form_fields.label: Timezone
form_fields.hint: Set your preferred timezone, e.g. Europe/Amsterdam
